description:
Zesium is delivering custom software/mobile app solutions.  Zesium is established 13 years ago where at this moment we have 50 employees + 30 external consultants. We had opportunity to work with companies  like JohnDeere, Siemens, Texas Instruments, DMS Schnider electric etc. We are able to deliver Team-as-service consultancy for different business domains in fixed priced or Timematerial mode.
 Beside that  we have our own Lab studio where we are able to develop MVP solutions from scratch using state-of-the art technology, business expertise and perfection of design.
Main technologies:
Mobile - Android and iOS
Web - .Net and JAVA
We also have teams that are specialized in: 
Data science
Speech recognition
Pattern recognition
Signal processing
Neural networks
Machine learninig

Together we can make great stories. Our approach is Lean, we like to give our clients chance to assess us.
